about_me.title: about me
about_me.summary: I am a programmer who is enthusiastic about learning new skills and technologies in the field of programming. My programming career began with entering university and learning languages like C and C++. Subsequently, due to my interest in programming, I started learning Python. The unique features of Python increased my interest in this language, and since then, I have been striving to deepen my knowledge in this area.

tasks: Backend developer using Django and Python...
Designed and implemented databases using PostgreSQL and Redis.
Experienced in working with version control systems like Git and utilizing software development methodologies like Scrum.
Designed and implemented web APIs for front-end communication and used gRPC for low-level system interactions.
